issue.title: WFS Transaction (WFS-T) is not supported
issue.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

WFS transaction is not supported in the 2.1.1 proxy version.

This operation (in mono-server context) used to be supported in very first versions of the proxy (2009 releases).

comments.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

Quick fix was done to allow transaction with a config linking only one remote server --> v2.1.2

To allow multi remote server config to be handle, work on the request parsing has to be done (filter allowed featureType, rewriting request for each remote server...)

**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

Issue moved as a feature.
Should be taken in charge when refactoring WFS connector...
